content.question: Which of the following best explains the “symptoms of much deeper changes” described by the author of Source 1 ?

choices.label: The growing industrial and military power of rival European states
The growth of national unification and independence movements across Europe
The spread of liberal ideas across Europe after the Revolutions of 1848
The changes in art and culture resulting from imperial contacts with non-European peoples

content.answer: The growing industrial and military power of rival European states

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
